name: Goodian: The Slime What Came From Space
name_original: Goodian: The Slime What Came From Space
description:
This is way under construction. Planned to be a For The Frog the bell tolls clone when its all said and done. Right now, it's a basic puzzle platformer.

Press Z to grab objects, and Space to jump. Z and Ctrl should both talk to NPCs, but I think that broke at build and I ran out of time in the game jam to finish it.

Collect all 5 coins and walk all the way right to win.
